entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting SearchBar CancelButtonColor doesn't work on Windows #13507
  • Custom gestures on image in carousel not responding/working #13504
    Backlog
  • Impossible to leave the picker with a physical keyboard #13503
    Backlog
  • Can't get started #13500
  • Wrong height for Label placed inside a Scrollview #13498
  • [WinUI] Flyout Popover doesn't reset "IsPresented" when dismissed via click on contents. #13496
    Backlog

Closed

  • MauiApp.Dispose fails when an IAsyncDisposable service is registered #13422
    8.0-preview2
  • IOS Simulator doesn't load after closing one time (just dotted circle loader) #13502
  • App crashes only in release and only on physical device #8928
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ObjCRuntime.RuntimeException has been thrown #13478

PullRequests

Created

  • Tag Dave Britch for breaking changes #13506
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fixed SwipeItems size dynamically changing the Content Margin #13501
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage

Merged

  • Implement IAsyncDisposable on MauiApp #13424
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.4.1 to 17.5.0 #13480
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • Include border size in Frame's measurement #13419
    area/layout 🔲
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `Application.OpenWindow()` #13400
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Handle renamed or deleted MauiImage files #13251
    area/single project ☝️
  • [iOS] Don't scroll more than the available scrollable space #13415
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • Use the TextColor value to set the ClearButton color on the Entry #13475
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • SensorSpeed: unify sensor intervals across all platforms #13372
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [net7.0] Windows apps do not need GUIDs (remove check) #13034
    area/single project ☝️, do-not-merge, backport/suggested
